alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 12:35PM MST until April 19 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST/1 AM MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Coconino County including Fredonia, Grand Canyon Village, Supai and Page. * WHEN...Until midnight MST/1 AM MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Saturated soils from snowmelt combined with the wind will result in an increased threat for blown down trees. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons
